## Which website?

- **Website name**:
- **Website URL**: https://...
- **What's on there**: Videos? Photos? Both?

## What do you want to download from it?

- [ ] Videos (the normal kind)
- [ ] Live streams or streaming videos
- [ ] Photos/images
- [ ] Other stuff:

## Why this website?

Why would this be useful? Is it a popular site? Do you use it a lot?

## Can you send me an example?

Drop a link to a specific video/photo you want to download. Make sure it's something public (not behind a paywall or login).

## Anything else I should know?

Does the site require an account? Is the content free? Anything special about it?
